original_text: Do not think like a fool! When you plant a seed in the ground, it has to die first. Then it can become alive again and grow into a new plant.
korean_text: 어리석은 자여 네가 뿌리는 씨가 죽지 않으면 살아나지 못하겠고

sentences.original_text: Do not think like a fool!
When you plant a seed in the ground,
Then it can become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그것은 다시 살아날 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and grow into a new plant.
